column1: 清晨到伊斯坦布尔，联程航班要晚上9点多才起飞，中间16小时 是否会安排免费酒店休息？持中国护照谢谢

本來有，但因疫情暫時中止，見土航官網公告：Stopover Free Accommodation Service has been temporarily suspended as a precaution to Corona Virus (COVID-19) as of 13th of March, 2020. https://www.turkishairlines.com/en-int/flights/stopover/

官网信息如下：https://www.turkishairlines.com/en-int/any-questions/transfer-transit-passengers/Including in the transfer or transit category, our Economy Class passengers making transit stops over 12 hours and our Business Class passengers making transit stops over 9 hours are entitled to benefit from hotel and catering services we procure through our contracted providersIf a transit flight with shorter connection time is available, ticketed passengers will not be able to benefit from the hotel service. For more information, please visit our hotel service webpage.
应该不可以，因为不能入境土耳其，您只能在机场内的酒店休息但疫情期间，不清楚能否入住酒店？可能要看你从哪个国家出发？
关键看购买机票的舱位等级来决定。如果是经济舱，特价票，是不会有免费酒店休息的。
向航司客服确认。疫情期间有很多临时措施出台，与平时完全不一样。
发邮件问航司应该会得到比较准确的回复，个人觉得跟机场没关系
曾经是有的，但是疫情期间没有了。
这个要问航空公司与机场
一般来说不会，最好还是联系官方确定下。
